metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10140 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Information disclosure and authentication bypass vulnerability exists inthe Apache HTTP Server configuration bundled with ZoneMinder v1.30 andv1.29, which allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to browse alldirectories in the web root, e.g., a remote unauthenticated attacker canview all CCTV images on the server via the /events URI.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
